ContentDescription: A mostly dark, near-black image. In the bottom-right corner, a small cluster of the golden constellation network peeks into frame — a few warm amber-gold nodes connected by fine luminous threads, fading quickly into darkness. The network occupies roughly the bottom-right 20% of the frame. The rest of the image is deep midnight blue-black with perhaps the faintest hint of scattered gold dust trailing away from the cluster. Extremely subdued — this is a background, not a focal image.

PresentationContext.VisualContinuity: Carries the golden constellation network motif from the cover slide — same nodes and threads, just a small corner fragment as a subtle reminder

Style.Rendering: Detailed digital illustration with fine luminous linework against deep darkness

Lighting.Type: Self-luminous nodes and threads against near-total darkness
Sources: Warm amber glow from nodes in bottom-right corner only
Lighting.Shadows: None — dark background with additive light only

ColorPalette.Treatment: 95% dark void. The small corner network uses the same warm gold-amber palette as the cover image. Very restrained — the gold should feel like a whisper, not a shout.

Effects: Faint gold dust particles trailing from the corner cluster
Atmosphere.Mood: Quiet, grounding — a subtle thread of continuity

Situation.Name: Corner Fragment - Sparse
Situation.Setting: Deep dark void with a small constellation fragment visible in the bottom-right corner
Situation.Camera: Wide, the network is far away, just barely entering the frame

Conceptual.Name: Corner network fragment
Conceptual.Description: 5-8 glowing amber-gold nodes of varying sizes connected by fine luminous threads, clustered in the bottom-right corner and fading into darkness
Conceptual.Application: Bottom-right 20% of frame only, fading rapidly toward center
Conceptual.SymbolicMeaning: The ever-present knowledge network, glimpsed at the edge

KeyDetails: The vast majority of the image must be dark — this is a text background
The network fragment should feel like part of the larger cover network, just a corner glimpse
Nodes must be connected by threads — no isolated elements
The gold glow should fade gently into the darkness, not cut off sharply

CompositionNotes: This must be extremely subdued. The image is 80%+ pure dark void. The golden network fragment in the bottom-right corner is the only visual element, and it should be modest — a few connected nodes with warm glow that fades into nothing. White text must be perfectly readable over most of this image.
